text:
e="preserve">:"NAS can also be a shorthand for Network-attached storage"
Nas (born Nasir Jones on September 14, 1973) is an American hip hop musician and actor. He is most known for his first album, "Illmatic", which was released in 1994. It has been widely critically praised. Nas has been nominated for twelve Grammy Awards.
Personal life.
Nas was born on September 14, 1973 in Brooklyn, New York.
On June 15, 1994, Nas's ex-fiancée Carmen Bryan gave birth to their daughter, Destiny. Nas was married to Kelis from 2005 until they divorced in 2010. She is the mother of his son.
Career.
In 2010, Nas released an album with Damian Marley called "Distant Relatives". It entered the "Billboard" 200 at number five. Three singles were released from the album. In 2012 Nas released his eleventh album "Life Is Good". He wrote it after he divorced Kelis. The album got good reviews. It was nominated for Best Rap Album at the 2013 Grammy Awards. Amy Winehouse sung on the track "Cherry Wine". Nas released his eleventh studio album, "Nasir", in 2018.
